channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Score: McDonald's, Tesla, Spirit Airlines and More Stocks That Defined the Week
item.description: Here are some of the major companies whose stocks moved on the week’s news.

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Futures Post Solid Weekly Gains
item.description: U.S. natural gas futures increased for a third straight session to end the week up 13%.

item.title: The WSJ Dollar Index Rises 0.88% This Week
item.description: The dollar continued higher, bringing its weekly rise to nearly 0.9%.

item.title: ‘She did not even attend his funeral’: My friend married in secret and suddenly died. Does his widow inherit his $1 million home?
item.description: “His parents paid for the $50,000 down payment to the house when they purchased it 30 years ago.”

item.title: Lyft told drivers they could make more than $30 an hour. The FTC says it deceived them.
item.description: Lyft made “deceptive” earnings claims about how much money drivers could expect to make per hour and how much they could earn in special incentives, t...

item.title: Dow, S&P 500 fall Friday — but Nasdaq sees longest weekly winning streak of 2024
item.description: U.S. stocks closed mixed Friday as Treasury yields pressed higher and investors weighed fresh economic data ahead of next week’s jobs report.

item.title: U.S. Stocks End Mixed as Nasdaq Leads Gains
item.description: Tech stocks climbed, lifting the Nasdaq Composite to a new intraday high, while the broader market closed out a losing week.

item.title: Gold Prices See Seventh Consecutive Weekly Uptick
item.description: Gold settled up 0.2% Friday and rose 1% in the week, its seventh consecutive weekly gain. Uncertainty surrounding the outcome of the U.S Presidential ...

item.title: ‘I always wait for my turn’: I don’t understand why airline passengers want to board early. Why do they act like savages?
item.description: American Airlines is targeting “gate lice” with technology that sets off an alarm when a passenger tries to skip their group number.

item.title: ‘I have few close friends’: I’m 69, retired, single and have amassed $3.6 million. What should I do with my fortune?
item.description: “Many weeks I spend more on my three rescue kitties and one rescue mouse than I do on myself.”
